calendar-scheduling.title: Calendar Scheduling
calendar-scheduling.description: Enable users to book time on each other's calendars from CometChat.

Help Center/docker.title: Docker
Help Center/docker.description: It is suggested to be familiar with the various kinds of roles for the on-premise deployment.

Help Center/limits.title: Limits
Help Center/limits.description: Limits help to provide a reliable chat experience and reduce downtime and errors.

Help Center/properties-and-constraints.title: Properties and Constraints
Help Center/properties-and-constraints.description: This page lists the properties and limits which are applicable to various CometChat systems.

migration-guide.title: Migration Guide
migration-guide.description: This guide will help you upgrade your application(s) and platform(s) from CometChat v2 to v3. The upgrade process is simple, since there only a few code-level changes required.
